title: Competent Authority, on the basis of verification of prescribed documents, shall decide eligibility of slum dwellers
clause_text: Competent Authority, on the basis of verification of prescribed documents, shall decide eligibility of slum dwellers. The slum dweller held eligible on 1st January 2000 shall be Protected Occupier. However the slum dweller held eligible on 1st January 2011 shall be
